ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2001_01_10: What is it? Is something up?
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
I kinda feel like things’ll be exciting whenever I’m
with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Let’s make a lot of memories again today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! ♪
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Hey there! You can have this, if you’d like!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2101_02_10: If I find something nice again, I’ll give it to you. ♪
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Guess what! I have a present for you, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! ♪
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
It’s to say thanks for always being such a good
friend to me. ♪
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2103_01_10: It’s a token of friendship from yours truly!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
Really, thanks for everything you do,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2103_03_10: Let’s keep being friends forever and ever, OK?
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I have so many things I wanna talk to you about,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... I can’t make up
my mind!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
Huh?! You’re giving this to me? Thanks,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Is it really OK for me to have this? Yay!
Thank you!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll take good care of your present,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
That was so much fun! Let’s talk again
sometime! ♪
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2401_01_10: I had a great time! Thanks for chatting with me!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I’ll keep the memory of our time together in an
album in my heart!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
It’s so much fun being able to chat with all sorts
of people!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Interacting with everybody’s made my circle of
friends bigger and bigger...
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
so making a hundred friends might not be just a
dream!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
When amusement parks give out complimentary
tickets, it’s usually as a set of two or more,
it seems.
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
It makes sense, since it’s more fun going together
with someone! ♪
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Double the fun with two friends, and triple it with
three! And with a hundred friends... I bet it’d be a
hundred times more fun! ♪
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
It’s not just great times or once-in-a-century
moments that I want to remember...
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I wanna make memories of the more ordinary
moments, too!
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8003_0701_03_10: Even the moments I mess up a little...  Hehehe.
ch0139_00_sana_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
After all, every moment and every experience
will be a precious memory of the time I spent
with my friends!
